Local Time is: 04/22/2021 14:21:24.271   Nanoseconds: 270949000
GMT Time is: 04/22/2021 18:21:24.271   Microseconds: 270949
Local Time is: 2021-04-22
Local Time is: 2021-04-22 14:21:24.270949

----- Testing DateTime's diff methods

dt1 is: 01/01/2002 12:54:31.000
dt2 is: 02/01/2002 03:50:30.000
second difference between dt1 and dt2: -2.64576e+06
minute difference between dt1 and dt2: -44096
hour difference between dt1 and dt2: -734.933
day difference between dt1 and dt2: -30.6222
business day difference between dt1 and dt2: -22.6222
week difference between dt1 and dt2: -4.3746
After adding 10000 weekdays days to 19700101, the date is 04/30/2008 00:00:00.000
